tool_description: Send SMS for 1 US Cent to USA or Canada via this API

api_list.name: SendSMS
api_list.description: Send an SMS to the USA or Canada for 1 cent. The payload should include the message text and the recipient's phone number.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The message content to be sent via SMS.

required_parameters.name: phone
required_parameters.description: The recipient's phone number in international format.
